name: Go Right (mhoff12358)
description:
(Works on mobile devices)

A mecha strategy game about trying to reach your objective in a city infested with giant alien monsters.

Thrown together for a game jam, so this is just an example of the core gameplay. You spawn in a map and try to get to the blue highlighted objective area on the right.

You can do up to 3 things on your turn, split between moving and using your weapons.

The first level is pretty basic and is meant to let you play around and understand how your weapons work, then the second level is the main game. You get your ammo back between levels.

Tall buildings can be knocked down to squish enemies and create barricades, and tanker trucks can be exploded to do damage to adjacent enemies (and you).

Enemy spawners will create enemies every 2 turns.
